title: Elon Musk Says He Met With Apple's Tim Cook Wednesday; Tweet about meeting comes days after new Twitter boss attacked Apple's management of apps, allegations of censorship
text:
Elon Musk said Wednesday he met with Apple Inc. Chief Executive Tim Cook at the company's headquarters, just days after the new Twitter Inc. boss launched a barrage of attacks on the company's App Store and advertising.

"Thanks @tim_cook for taking me around Apple's beautiful HQ," Mr. Musk wrote on Twitter.

Mr. Musk on Monday accused Apple of stanching free speech and claiming that the tech giant had threatened to kick the Twitter app off the iPhone.

Apple didn't immediately respond to a request for comment.

Updates to follow as news develops.

Elon Musk Says He Met With Apple's Tim Cook Wednesday
